the supervision of the activity connnected with protection of a person, place etc. or with prevention of a prisoner or prisoners from escaping, etc.
(fig.) superiority; pre-eminence; excellence.
a man who surpasses others; an excellent man.
an extra quantity of grain (usu. one koḷaga) given, along with the quantity as per the agreement, to the owner of the land.
